EmailDomainFilter.name: EmailDomainFilter
EmailDomainFilter.description: Represents a filter that determines whether an email relay is restricted to a specific list of domains.

EmailRelayId.description: The ID of the EmailRelay record.

FromDomain.description: Restricts the email relay to send emails based on the sender domains (FromDomain) listed in this field. This field is optional, accepts a list of comma-separated values, and supports the wildcard character.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the email domain filter is active (true) or not (false). Use this field to enable or disable the email domain filter.

PriorityNumber.description: Indicates the order in which the email domain filter is processed. Filters are evaluated in ascending order. The priority number must be unique. If this field is left blank, it is assigned the next available number and is processed last. Processing stops after the first matching filter is applied.

ToDomain.description: Restricts the email relay to send emails based on the recipient domains (ToDomain) listed in this field. This field is optional, accepts a list of comma-separated values, and supports the wildcard character.
